references.paper_title: A comprehensive survey on graph neural networks
references.reason: Provides a broad overview of graph neural networks (GNNs), which is the foundational technology of the research conducted in the paper.

references.paper_title: Group property inference attacks against graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper is directly related to the research in the paper, exploring graph property inference attacks, a key focus of this paper.

references.paper_title: Property inference attacks on fully connected neural networks using permutation invariant representations
references.reason: This paper explores property inference attacks, introducing techniques that this paper leverages and extends.

references.paper_title: Hacking smart machines with smarter ones: How to extract meaningful data from machine learning classifiers
references.reason: This is a foundational paper for property inference attacks, introducing the concept and laying groundwork for further research.

references.paper_title: Leakage of dataset properties in Multi-Party machine learning
references.reason: This paper addresses property inference in the context of multi-party machine learning, a setting relevant to the paper's discussion of collaborative model training.
